Coronavirus

The spread of Covid-19 has caused the death of tens of thousands across the world, posing the biggest public health threat of this generation. Social distancing measures have been put in place in the UK in order to slow the spread of the killer bug, with the closure of schools and non-essential shops. For all the latest updates on coronavirus, including symptoms, transmissions and treatments, keep checking back here.
